I ended up winning two T3 Lajoie's in recent auctions ending the same night. I only need 1 so you have your choice of either a PSA 2 or SGC 3. After the 1st one goes, I will remove the other one from offer and add it to my collection. I will lower the prices to take a 1 increment hit on the final auction amounts. Prices include a trackable service. Paypal only.







PSA 2      $700



SGC 40 (3) $1100
